value:
I've got a pretty heavy task ahead of
me. You could say my gambling has
been a way to test my luck.$k$pA way to make sure I'm ready for it.

As a journeyman, I traveled far and
wide. I worked as a mercenary back
then.$k$pMade a fair bit of money gambling at
pubs, too!

This place is a lot different from my
country, but it's pretty nice. Could use
a gambling hall, though...

So... You want to make a bet? Ha,
don't worry. You're an amateur, so I'll
go easy on you!

The way I see it, there are two ways
to look at gambling. Sure, you could
lose all your money...$k$pBut you could also consider that
paying your tuition! After all, losing
is a valuable life lesson, innit?

Your pal $Nf
asked me to give you this and was
insistent I not gamble it away.

Hm. Must be what they call
"dumb luck."
My luck hasn't run dry yet.
Not my lucky day...

I'll use this strength for Jehanna,
for my mother...and for everyone.

I'm Joshua, a mercenary. Did a coin
flip bring me here? Well, either way...
I guess you're my new boss.

I left my home at a young age to
travel the land. I spent a long time just
wandering all over.$k$pLooking back, it may not have been
the smartest decision... But it did
lead me to you.$k$pI'll return to my country eventually.
Then I'll succeed to the throne and
devote myself fully to ruling.$k$pOh, did I mention? I'm the crown
prince of Jehanna. And when I go
back, I want you to come with me.$k$pI don't need your answer now, but
give it some thought. Maybe we can
flip a coin to decide?
はっ！
悪いな
うああっ！
ついてねえ…
Don't hold this against me.
Sorry, friend.
Care for a wager?
I'll test your worth!
All outta luck...
Heh.
Care to test your luck? Heads, I win—tails, you lose.
Hm? Guess you caught me cheating, huh?
How about a small wager on the toss of a coin? I choose tails.
Hm, it's heads. Today must be your lucky day.
Oops, that's tails. Looks like I win this one.
Mother, forgive me. One day, I will return to our country, just as I promised. I swear it...
I could use your help. If I win our next bet, lend me your aid.
Lucky me.
Heads or tails?
Decided?
